term.title: hydrogen

item.text: The general name for the atom H, without regard for its nuclear mass, either for hydrogen in its natural abundance or where it is not desired to distinguish between the isotopes. The systematic name for atomic hydrogen is monohydrogen.

sources.item: PAC, 1988, 60, 1115. 'Names for hydrogen atoms, ions, and groups, and for reactions involving them (Recommendations 1988)' on page 1116 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198860071115)
